img_above_text:
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(94\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f6/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2894%29.png)
Follow the path to the left and toward the cave at the end of it. Just before you get there, you'll see another green Wisp to be collected to the left. Once you've grabbed it, head inside the cave.
img_below_text:
The cave is very dark, but you'll be able to see the faint glow of a green Wisp to the left and lava to the right. Head for the lava, to find a Revenant Charbone, but also a pathway that leads outside.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(91\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/de/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2891%29.png)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 50 from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(94\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f6/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2894%29.png)
Follow the path to the left and toward the cave at the end of it. Just before you get there, you'll see another green Wisp to be collected to the left. Once you've grabbed it, head inside the cave."
            - Following Text: "The cave is very dark, but you'll be able to see the faint glow of a green Wisp to the left and lava to the right. Head for the lava, to find a Revenant Charbone, but also a pathway that leads outside.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(91\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/de/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2891%29.png)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a dark cave with intricate stone carvings on the walls. A character, armed with a staff, is seen standing in the foreground, facing the cave's interior. Two red markers highlight points of interest deeper within the cave. The preceding text suggests the player should collect a green Wisp before entering the cave, while the following text indicates the cave contains another green Wisp and a Revenant Charbone near lava. The image serves to guide players through the cave, emphasizing key locations and potential threats.
